nodes.text: Ugroth was a male warlord whose sector was conquered by the reconstituted Sith Empire in the year 3966 BBY in order to suppress possibilities of rebellion. He swore fealty to Darth Nyriss, a member of the Empire's ruling Dark Council and the head of the Imperial attackers, prompting Nyriss to order a commemorative bust of Ugroth, which she placed in her residence. Her attaché, Sechel, later described Ugroth's bust to the Sith Lord Scourge when he arrived at Nyriss's stronghold.

Ugroth was first mentioned in Drew Karpyshyn's 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, when the Scourge first enters Darth Nyriss' residence and is treated to a running commentary on the artwork by Sechel.
